channel.title: Windows 11 24h2 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Windows 11 24h2 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Windows 11 25H2 update hits its last stop before release to the general public
item.description: The 25H2 update will be a quiet one, after 24H2’s under-the-hood overhauls.

item.title: Having recovery and/or SSD problems after recent Windows updates? You’re not alone.
item.description: Recovery issue is already resolved; SSD problems have been trickier to diagnose.

item.title: Microsoft is revamping Windows 11’s Task Manager so its numbers make more sense
item.description: Changes are rolling out to Windows Insider testers in the Dev and Beta channels.

item.title: Revamped Task Manager, second-monitor notifications coming soon to Windows 11
item.description: Changes are rolling out to Windows Insider testers in the Dev and Beta channels.

item.title: Office problems on Windows 10? Microsoft’s response will soon be “upgrade to 11.”
item.description: Security updates will continue, but new features will require Windows 11.

item.title: New Windows 11 build adds self-healing “quick machine recovery” feature
item.description: New recovery mode lets Microsoft fix “widespread boot issues” affecting PCs.
